title: Ai no Wakakusa Yama Monogatari
synopsis: The comic story of Shizuka, the eldest daughter, who lives at home, showing no signs of getting married; her mother, who is both annoyed with Shizuka, and at the same time concerned about her window of eligibility; her sister Ikumi, with whom she gets along, even though they fight; and her father, who feels henpecked in this all-female household.
staff: [['Kume, Issei', ['Director']], ["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Anno, Hideaki', ['Planning']], ['Terashima, Reiko', ['Original Creator']]]
